targets.query:
SELECT
  SUM(gross_pnl) as total_return
FROM "$strategy"
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND ('$symbol' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$symbol', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || ticker || '|%')
  AND ('$side' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$side', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || side || '|%')
  AND ('$status' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$status', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || status || '|%')
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  SUM(gross_pnl) as total_return
FROM "$strategy"
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND ('$symbol' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$symbol', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || ticker || '|%')
  AND ('$side' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$side', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || side || '|%')
  AND ('$status' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$status', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || status || '|%')

targets.query:
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN gross_pnl < 0 THEN ABS(gross_pnl) ELSE 0 END) > 0
    THEN ROUND(
      SUM(CASE WHEN gross_pnl > 0 THEN gross_pnl ELSE 0 END) /
      SUM(CASE WHEN gross_pnl < 0 THEN ABS(gross_pnl) ELSE 0 END),
      2
    )
    ELSE 0
  END as profit_loss_ratio
FROM "$strategy"
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND ('$symbol' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$symbol', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || ticker || '|%')
  AND ('$side' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$side', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || side || '|%')
  AND ('$status' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$status', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || status || '|%')
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN gross_pnl < 0 THEN ABS(gross_pnl) ELSE 0 END) > 0
    THEN ROUND(
      SUM(CASE WHEN gross_pnl > 0 THEN gross_pnl ELSE 0 END) /
      SUM(CASE WHEN gross_pnl < 0 THEN ABS(gross_pnl) ELSE 0 END),
      2
    )
    ELSE 0
  END as profit_loss_ratio
FROM "$strategy"
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND ('$symbol' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$symbol', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || ticker || '|%')
  AND ('$side' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$side', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || side || '|%')
  AND ('$status' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$status', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || status || '|%')

targets.query:
SELECT
  (COUNT(CASE WHEN gross_pnl > 0 THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*)) as win_percentage
FROM "$strategy"
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND ('$symbol' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$symbol', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || ticker || '|%')
  AND ('$side' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$side', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || side || '|%')
  AND ('$status' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$status', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || status || '|%')

SELECT
  (COUNT(CASE WHEN gross_pnl > 0 THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*)) as win_percentage

  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND ('$symbol' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$symbol', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || ticker || '|%')
  AND ('$side' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$side', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || side || '|%')
  AND ('$status' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$status', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || status || '|%')

targets.query:
SELECT
  time,
  SUM(gross_pnl) OVER (ORDER BY time) as cumulative_return
FROM "$strategy"
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND ('$symbol' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$symbol', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || ticker || '|%')
  AND ('$side' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$side', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || side || '|%')
  AND ('$status' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$status', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || status || '|%')
ORDER BY time
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  SUM(gross_pnl) OVER (ORDER BY time) as cumulative_return
FROM "$strategy"
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND ('$symbol' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$symbol', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || ticker || '|%')
  AND ('$side' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$side', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || side || '|%')
  AND ('$status' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$status', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || status || '|%')
ORDER BY time

targets.query:
SELECT
  CASE WHEN gross_pnl > 0 THEN 'WIN' ELSE 'LOSS' END as result,
  status,
  side,
  ticker as symbol,
  CAST(CAST(entry_time AS BIGINT) / 1000 AS TIMESTAMP) as open_date,
  entry_price as entry,
  shares as size,
  time as close_date,
  exit_price as exit,
  (entry_price * shares) as cost,
  gross_pnl as net_return,
  gross_pnl_pct as net_return_pct,
  CAST((EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM time) - EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM CAST(CAST(entry_time AS BIGINT) / 1000 AS TIMESTAMP))) / 86400 AS INTEGER) as time_held
FROM "$strategy"
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND ('$symbol' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$symbol', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || ticker || '|%')
  AND ('$side' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$side', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || side || '|%')
  AND ('$status' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$status', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || status || '|%')
ORDER BY time DESC
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  CASE WHEN gross_pnl > 0 THEN 'WIN' ELSE 'LOSS' END as result,
  status,
  side,
  ticker as symbol,
  CAST(CAST(entry_time AS BIGINT) / 1000 AS TIMESTAMP) as open_date,
  entry_price as entry,
  shares as size,
  time as close_date,
  exit_price as exit,
  (entry_price * shares) as cost,
  gross_pnl as net_return,
  gross_pnl_pct as net_return_pct,
  CAST((EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM time) - EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM CAST(CAST(entry_time AS BIGINT) / 1000 AS TIMESTAMP))) / 86400 AS INTEGER) as time_held
FROM "$strategy"
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND ('$symbol' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$symbol', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || ticker || '|%')
  AND ('$side' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$side', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || side || '|%')
  AND ('$status' = '$__all' OR '|' || REPLACE(REPLACE('$status', '(', ''), ')', '') || '|' LIKE '%|' || status || '|%')
ORDER BY time DESC

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT ticker
FROM "$strategy"
ORDER BY ticker
list.label: Symbol
list.name: symbol

query.query:
SELECT DISTINCT ticker
FROM "$strategy"
ORDER BY ticker

list.definition:
SELECT table_name
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES
WHERE table_type = 'BASE TABLE'
  AND table_name NOT IN (
    'distinct_caches',
    'influxdb_schema',
    'last_caches',
    'parquet_files',
    'processing_engine_logs',
    'processing_engine_trigger_arguments',
    'processing_engine_triggers',
    'queries'
  )
ORDER BY table_name
list.label: Strategy
list.name: strategy

query.query:
SELECT table_name
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES
WHERE table_type = 'BASE TABLE'

    'parquet_files',
    'processing_engine_logs',
    'processing_engine_trigger_arguments',
    'processing_engine_triggers',
    'queries'
  )
ORDER BY table_name
